original_text: Now Israel loved Joseph more than any of his other sons, because he had been born to him in his old age; and he made an ornate robe for him.
korean_text: 요셉은 노년에 얻은 아들이므로 이스라엘이 여러 아들들보다 그를 더 사랑하므로 그를 위하여 채색옷을 지었더니

sentences.original_text: Now Israel loved Joseph more than any of his other sons
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 이스라엘은 요셉을 다른 아들들보다 더 사랑했으니

sentences.original_text: because he had been born to him in his old age
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 늙은 나이에 그에게 태어났기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: and he made an ornate robe for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그를 위해 화려한 겉옷을 만들어 주었다
